reviewText: i love this dvd! im 16 yr's old and almost watch it everyday. my fav. song is "i don't believe in dustbunnies", i pretty much no every word :-)its a must get for any age!
The show is great and my daughter has about 15 of the dvd's but the audio on this dvd was very poor. It sounds horrible. I will continue to buy more and hope the quality is better.
My daughter loves The Big Comfy Couch series.  And, I love the fact that I don't have to worry about the content.  It's wholesome entertainment from a show that is not so "commercialized."
My Grand-daughter loves the movies. Fast delivery too...right in time for her birthday!
I love this show and I have introduce my children to it even though is no longer showing on TV. I highly recommend it.
Great video !! very entertaining and educational.  My kids love it very much and ask to see it over and over
Brittney, my special needs Granddaugter loves the big comfy couch. Thanks for having this item. I am sure I will be ordering again.
These videos are extremely rare and hard to find. I purchased this used video for my daughter for Christmas and she loves it. Its in excellent condition.
awesome video my son (3 yr old) can't get enough of this dvd (I'm sick of it) but as long as he's happy I'm happy LOL
My daughter love BCC but she really has no interest in this DVD. Very slow and boring in my opinion.
This is a great DVD for the kids and it arrived on time and in great shape at a great price. Would do business with this seller again.

Since watching this dvd my daughter is now thinking she's a chef.  It's so wonderful because she was already helpful in the kitchen and now she's even more helpful!  I love how it teaches responsibility while in the kitchen and my daughter loves these clowns!
The is a great kids movie!!!!!! I'm careful about what my children watch and this is a clean, fun movie.
